arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "SELECT " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" AS \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"PROC_NAME\\" AS \\"PROC_NAME\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"PROC_NO\\" AS \\"PROC_NO\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" AS \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WS_CD\\" AS \\"WS_CD\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WS_NAME\\" AS \\"WS_NAME\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\") AS \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\") AS \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\" AS \\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_SLIP_ISS_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS \\"OPR_INST_SLIP_ISS_DATE\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\" AS \\"OPR_INST_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"DRAW_CD\\" AS \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"SPEC\\" AS \\"SPEC\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" AS \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" AS \\"PLANT_NAME\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" AS \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" CASE " +" WHEN TAB_A.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\" > TAB_A.\\"IDENT_CARD_QTY\\" THEN 0 " +" ELSE 1 " +" END AS \\"CARD_PRINTED_FLG\\" " +"FROM " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\") AS \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\") AS \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" SUM(NVL(T_IDENT_CARD.\\"IDENT_CARD_QTY\\",0)) AS \\"IDENT_CARD_QTY\\" " +" FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC, " +" T_IDENT_CARD, " +" T_OD " +" WHERE " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = T_IDENT_CARD.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\"(+) " +" AND T_IDENT_CARD.\\"DEL_FLG\\"(+) = 0 " +" AND T_IDENT_CARD.\\"OUTPUT_FLG\\"(+) = 1 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\"(+) " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" = 1 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"FINAL_PROC_FLG\\" = 1 " +" GROUP BY " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" " +" ) TAB_A " +"WHERE " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = TAB_A.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\"(+) " +" AND TO_CHAR(V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') <= ? " +" AND TO_CHAR(V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') <= ? " +" AND V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WS_CD\\" = ? " +" AND V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\" = ?"
"select " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"DISPLAY_NAME\\" as \\"DISPLAY_NAME\\" " +"from " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +"where " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"NAME\\" = 'OUTSIDE_TYP' " +" and SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"VALUE\\" = ?"
"select " +" to_char(T_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as MODIFY_COUNT " +"from " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP " +"where " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"

"select " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"PROC_NAME\\" as \\"PROC_NAME\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"PROC_NO\\" as \\"PROC_NO\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" as \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WS_CD\\" as \\"WS_CD\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WS_NAME\\" as \\"WS_NAME\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" to_char(V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\", " +" to_char(V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_SLIP_ISS_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"OPR_INST_SLIP_ISS_DATE\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\" as \\"OPR_INST_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" as \\"PLANT_NAME\\", " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP " +"where " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" count(1) " +"FROM " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\") AS \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\") AS \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" SUM(NVL(T_IDENT_CARD.\\"IDENT_CARD_QTY\\",0)) AS \\"IDENT_CARD_QTY\\" " +" FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC, " +" T_IDENT_CARD, " +" T_OD " +" WHERE " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = T_IDENT_CARD.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\"(+) " +" AND T_IDENT_CARD.\\"DEL_FLG\\"(+) = 0 " +" AND T_IDENT_CARD.\\"OUTPUT_FLG\\"(+) = 1 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\"(+) " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" = 1 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"FINAL_PROC_FLG\\" = 1 " +" GROUP BY " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" " +" ) TAB_A " +"WHERE " +" V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = TAB_A.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\"(+) " +" AND TO_CHAR(V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') <= ? " +" AND TO_CHAR(V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') <= ? " +" AND V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"WS_CD\\" = ? " +" AND V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND V_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\" = ? " +" AND ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"

"SELECT " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.ITEM_CD) ITEM_CD, " +" MAX(M_ITEM.ITEM_NAME) ITEM_NAME, " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WS_CD) WS_CD, " +" TO_CHAR(MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OPR_INST_QTY)) OPR_INST_QTY, " +" TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T_IDENT_CARD.IDENT_CARD_QTY,0))) IDENT_CARD_QTY, " +" MAX(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OPR_INST_CD) OPR_INST_CD, " +" MAX(T_OD.JOB_ODR_CD) JOB_ODR_CD, " +" TO_CHAR(MAX(M_ITEM.PKG_UNIT_QTY)) PKG_UNIT_QTY, " +" MAX(M_ITEM.STOCK_UNIT) STOCK_UNIT " +"FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC, " +" T_IDENT_CARD, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_OD " +"WHERE " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.ITEM_CD " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OPR_INST_CD = T_IDENT_CARD.OPR_INST_CD(+) " +" AND T_IDENT_CARD.DEL_FLG(+) = 0 " +" AND T_IDENT_CARD.OUTPUT_FLG(+) = 1 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OD_NO = T_OD.OD_NO(+) " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OUTSIDE_TYP = 1 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.FINAL_PROC_FLG = 1 " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +"GROUP BY " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.OPR_INST_CD"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_IDENT_CARD(IDENT_CARD_CTL_NO, OPR_INST_CD, PARTIAL_PRD_NO, RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD, ITEM_CD, JOB_ODR_CD, FIRST_IDENT_CARD_QTY, IDENT_CARD_QTY, OPR_DATE, PKG_UNIT_QTY, PLANT_CD, WS_CD, PRINT_QTY, PRINT_DATE, PRINT_FLG, CHANGE_FLG, DEL_FLG, OUTPUT_FLG) " +"VALUES " +" (?, ?, 0, 0, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TRUNC(SYSDATE), ?, ?, ?, NULL, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 1)"
"UPDATE " +" T_IDENT_CARD " +"SET " +" PRINT_QTY = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" PRINT_DATE = SYSDATE, " +" PRINT_FLG = 1 " +"WHERE " +" IDENT_CARD_CTL_NO = ?"
